title: Modern 6-Bedroom House with Trendy Outdoor Spaces in Ustka's Port District
description: Step into this spacious 6-bedroom, 3-bathroom house designed for modern urban living in the tranquil Port District neighborhood of Ustka. Spanning a generous 212 sqm, this standalone home is perfect for flexible life needs: home office setups, entertaining guests, or relaxed family living. Highlighted by thoughtfully designed outdoor and indoor social zones, you'll love the bespoke barbecue area and the airy outdoor dining terrace. Ample storage—and even an underground garage—add daily convenience, while eco-minded touches such as recycling facilities round out the package.
neighborhood_description: Live just minutes from Ustka's city center while enjoying a peaceful, pet-friendly vibe where nature meets energy. The area features lush parks, accessible playgrounds, and ample biking paths—fantastic for morning jogs or daily commutes. Great highway links let you travel swiftly; explore the coast or commute for work with ease.
lifestyle_benefits: Ideal for digital nomads craving silence yet quick urban access
Enthusiasts of biking, hiking, and coastal life
Perfect for entertaining friends and connecting outdoors
Nearby green areas offering relaxation and play
target_buyer: Young professionals or digital nomads who value space, flexibility, easy biking access, and eco-friendly amenities in a relaxing, pet-friendly coastal neighborhood.
market_positioning: Stands out as an affordable yet fully featured modern house, in a serene neighborhood with rare access to both nature and the city center; ideally suited for young, remote-working populations seeking lifestyle and investment potential in Ustka.
